TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 表示當符合規則時，包含執行之 ECMAScript 的標記。

span.span: Represents a tag that contains ECMAScript that is run when the rule is matched.

summary.span: 建立 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 建立 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立語意解譯標記其屬性包含空字串。This constructor creates a semantic interpretation tag whose property contains an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string script) cil managed

param.name: script
param.span: 包含標記之 [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) 的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) for the tag.

summary.span: 建立類別的執行個體，指定標記的指令碼內容。

span.span: Creates an instance of the class, specifying the script contents of the tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立語意解譯標記其屬性設定中的值為`script`。This constructor creates a semantic interpretation tag whose property is set to the value in `script`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Script { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Script : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定標記的 ECMAScript。

span.span: Gets or sets the ECMAScript for the tag.

value.span: 字串，包含標記的語意轉譯指令碼。

span.span: A string that contains the semantic interpretation script for the tag.
An attempt is made to set **Script** to .
